contentList.content: Stores your thieves' tools and trap disarm toolkits.
This set of tools includes a small file, a set of lock picks, a small mirror mounted on a metal handle, a set of narrow-bladed scissors, and a pair of pliers.
This kit enables you to disarm traps, based on a Sleight of Hand <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Check</LSTag>. The kit breaks on an unsuccessful attempt.
A collection of hooks, blades, shears, and everything else needed to deal with potentially deadly traps.
